  Text content: The AI chip and supercomputer supply chain involves complex processes including cutting-edge manufacturing, packaging, assembly, and testing. NVIDIA collaborates closely with industry leaders Amkor and SPIL for packaging and testing operations in Arizona.

edit target content:
The AI chip and supercomputer supply chain involves complex processes including cutting-edge manufacturing, packaging, assembly, and testing. NVIDIA collaborates closely with industry leaders Amkor and SPIL for packaging and testing operations in Arizona.

In the next four years, NVIDIA aims to invest up to $500 billion in U.S.-based AI infrastructure, working with partners such as TSMC, Foxconn, Wistron, Amkor, and SPIL. These partnerships enhance NVIDIA's global footprint, create new business opportunities, and strengthen supply chain resilience.
content after edit: AI Chip and Supply Chain Overview

The AI chip and supercomputer supply chain encompasses advanced manufacturing, packaging, assembly, and rigorous testing processes. NVIDIA partners with industry leaders Amkor and SPIL for packaging and testing in Arizona, ensuring top-tier quality.

Over the next four years, NVIDIA plans to invest up to $500 billion in U.S.-based AI infrastructure, collaborating with key partners including TSMC, Foxconn, Wistron, Amkor, and SPIL. These strategic partnerships expand NVIDIA's global reach, create new business opportunities, and enhance supply chain resilience.
